      • parseTime

        public static long parseTime(String timeString)
        Parse a QuakeML time string. Similar to ISO 8601, but not quite the same. Because yet another time standard is exactly what we need. When will we learn?
        Parameters:
        timeString - Time string
        Returns:
        time in typical epoch ms

      • parseDate

        Returns:

        Returns:
